channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15913] Sasl encryption doesn't work with AsyncRpcChannel
item.description: The async RPC code in branch-1 will have problems with qop != auth. It's the same as HBASE-15830.
item.summary: Sasl encryption doesn't work with AsyncRpcChannel

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Gary Helmling, the patch is available on review board. For the test case, TestSecureIPC and TestAsyncSecureIPC are added with a litter difference because SaslUtil in branch-1 is different with master.

-1 overall

Thanks for reviewing, stack. I was away on vacation last week, still digging myself out.
